case_circumstances: The remains of this unknown female were found on Tuesday, June 28, 1999 in the basement of 604 North Avenue in Wilkinsburg.  The new owner of the house had started renovations and wanted things removed from the basement.  The basement door was found to have been nailed shut from the inside.  When the nails were removed and the door opened, the Unknown black femaleâ€™s body was found at the base of the storm door stairs. The house had been empty and abandoned for about a year prior to the remains being found.
case_head_hair: Black hair. The braided hairstyle in the sketch is accurate
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_on_body: Wearing black "Fubu" brand jeans, a brown, white and beige shirt
case_footwear: one black shoe on left foot, size 7 1/2.
case_jewelry: Gold chain, one gold earring ( description available).
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
